overview: Although he has inherited all money from his father, Mark is not interested in business so much, because he has a weakness-- sex. So his mother Mrs. Carter, with the help of Mr. Carmichael, an escort organizer, hires a high class prostitute, Sunny, to marry her son by manipulating him as part of the inheritance scheme. But Sunny soon will have other plans.
tagline: Sunny Will Send You On A Sexual Journey... That You'll Never Forget!
title: Sunny
